Sketchnotes: Q&A With Ethan Marcotte

Oct 10, 2015

Yesterday I sat in on a Q&A session with Ethan Marcotte at The Iron Yard. Ethan is the creator of responsive web design(!), which is the methodology I learned to design websites. I feel very lucky to have been there and to learn first-hand from someone whoâ€™s had such an impact on web design. Thanks, Ethan!
